dataObject.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObject.dc:description: This species is distributed from about the Onilahy River along the entire west coast to the north perhaps as far as Ankarafantsika National Park. A disjunct population is also found in the southeast up to the littoral forests of the Mandena Conservation Zone (Mittermeier et al. 2008).

dataObject.dc:description:
Microcebus murinus is found throughout Madagascar in dense forest regions.

Biogeographic Regions: ethiopian (Native )

dataObject.dc:title: Microcebus murinus (Gray Mouse Lemur)
